After fully digesting the Scholar of Yore potion, his connection with the Sefirah Castle is further strengthened. His Spirit Body can enter the Sefirah Castle at any time without setting up the Luck Enhancement Ritual but he needs the prayers of each Tarot Club Member as an Anchor to do that.

At Sequence 2
Upon becoming a Sequence 2: Miracle Invoker, Klein truly gains control over the Sefirah Castle as its owner and is able to bring out more of the Sefirah Castle's power. No longer required to chant the incantation or rely on the Tarot Club members' prayers, he can freely enter the Castle just with his thoughts;[4] however, he is still unable to bring his physical body along.
Inside the Sefirah Castle, he possesses powers close to the level of a King of Angels, and the authority that he can show includes some portion of Planeswalker and some portion of Trojan Horse of Destiny. Additionally, while in the real world, he can borrow the power of the Sefirah Castle to create an embryonic divine kingdom where he has powers equivalent to a Sequence 1: Attendant of Mysteries of Fool Pathway, but he can't use high-level abilities of Error Pathway and Door Pathway.

At Sequence 1
After becoming a Sequence 1: Attendant of Mysteries, Klein's control over the Sefirah Castle deepens, allowing him to take out items stored in the Castle at any time.
After becoming a King of Angels who contains two Sequence 1 characteristics, Klein is able to borrow the powers nearing sequence 0 for Fool Pathway as well as most powers under Sequence 0 of Error Pathway and Door Pathway. As the owner of the Sefirah Castle who hasn't fully gained control of the sefirot, he is now considered a king of Kings of Angels and very close to the level of a True God, with the differences in powers between him inside the Sefirah Castle and him in the real world being almost gone.
The advantage of being inside the Sefirah Castle is that he will be provided a defensive barrier that even a True God can't break.
The power of the gray fog stems from the power of the Sefirah Castle.

At Sequence 0, when in control over the Sefirah Castle, both Klein and Amon could use all of the abilities of the Fool, Error and Door pathways, including those gained at godhood, through 'borrowing' the pathway's authorities.

7.content:
The Chaos Sea (Ê∑∑Ê≤åÊµ∑, H√πnd√πnh«éi) is one of the nine Sefirot on Earth, a legacy left behind by the Original Creator and originally possessed by Primordial God Almighty.

It corresponds to one of the three Pillars, the God Almighty Group. The Ancient Gods believe that this sefirah is a source of corruption beneath the world. The Chaos Sea is very large. It almost fills the core of Earth, and goes to a further layer. It‚Äôs also the only sefirah that merges the real and the illusory and has an entrance in the real world, which means it can be entered through the Physical World. The known portal to enter the Chaos Sea is underneath Chernobyl in the Forsaken Land of the Gods.

According to Amon, the First Blasphemy Slate was likely born there, but it was later attracted by some power and left the ground before it was complete.


History
..
According to several documents Klein discovered in the research facility on Chernobyl, the experiments began after the discovery of a strange substance in a dried-up oil field. Klein speculates that the underground corruption had long been subtly influencing the human world, intermittently triggering mysterious events. It was only when the facility delved too deeply that Chaos Sea was fully awakened.

During the Second Epoch, powerful creatures attempted to completely eliminate the pollution of the Chaos Sea. However, it made things worse and caused tremendous losses. Later, they abandoned the idea of directly exerting influence and instead focused on sealing and guarding it. The Dragon of Imagination, Ankewelt later sealed the pollution of the Chaos Sea within the Groselle's Travels.

At the end of the 2nd Epoch, the Ancient Sun God walked out of Chernobyl and inherited the Chaos Sea and gradually promoted to Above the Sequence.[6] He noticed that Primordial God Almighty might awake in his body. He created Sasrir with part of his personality to control the power of the Chaos Sea.

After the death of the Ancient Sun God, the Chaos Sea polluted Sasrir and turned him into the evil spirit, and he started sleeping in the Giant King's Court. While Klein and the others successfully purified the evil spirit in the Fifth Epoch, the First Blasphemy Slate and the authority of the Chaos Sea was stolen by Amon.




Based on the Blasphemy Slate, the Chaos Sea is also related to the Apotheosis Ritual of the Sequence 0: Demoness. Lumian Lee suspected that the Primordial God Almighty had altered the corresponding knowledge on the first Blasphemy Slate to facilitate "His" unique revival through the Pathways of Calamity and allow "Him" to control and utilize the Chaos Sea effectively post-resurrection. However, it also makes sense for a Demoness, who governs chaos, to need prior contact with the Chaos Sea.[12]

After The Apocalypse concluded, when discussing the prospect of creating new Great Old Ones on Earth, Klein mentioned that after the near-resurrection of the Primordial God Almighty, without hundreds or thousands of years to wear down "His" strengthened consciousnesses, none of the God Almighty's five pathways are suitable for birthing a corresponding Sequence 0, much like how in the Fourth Epoch, the Kings of Angels of the Lord of Mysteries group could not ascend.[13]

8.content:
The River of Eternal Darkness (Ê∞∏Êöó‰πãÊ≤≥, River of Perpetual Darkness, Y«íng√†n Zhƒ´ H√©) is one of the nine Sefirot on Earth. It corresponds to the Above the Sequence Eternal Darkness.

It is one of two Sefirot making up the Fourth Pillar.

A broad, straight, dark, and colorless river flows silently, heralding the stillness of fate and the proclamation of death. Within the illusory dark waters, figures dressed like the Haoli Sect master appeared, floating and sinking.

This was a river that did not Loop. It always moved forward.

Even death itself would dissipate within its currents.

After the Original Creator awakened at the end of the Pre-Epoch, "His" two dominant split entities - the Primordial God Almighty and the Celestial Worthy of Heaven and Earth for Blessings - leveraged "Their" long-prepared ancient schemes across the times of the Old Earth to gradually gain advantages in "Their" fight against the other Sefirot. The two Pillars eventually defeated the other Sefirot and shattered "Their" wills (excluding the Brood Hive and the Key of Light),[5] making those wills take a very long time to recover and awaken again.[6]

During the early-mid stages of the First Epoch, the Celestial Worthy of Heaven and Earth for Blessings accommodated the River of Eternal Darkness. This left "His" consciousness and psyche in the Sefirah after "His" death.[7]

After the Primordial God Almighty and the Celestial Worthy of Heaven and Earth for Blessings's death at the hands of each other, the River of Eternal Darkness was sealed in the Western Continent by the Celestial Worthy along with 6 other Sefirot.[8] In the Western Continent, the River of Eternal Darkness became the Sefirah of the Haoli Sect.[9]

As time went by, the seal of the Western Continent gradually weakened. The Sefirot would instinctively or consciously corrode the Uniqueness and High-Sequence Beyonder Characteristics within their symbolic range to influence the outside world. The first to seep out energy was the River of Eternal Darkness. In the Second Epoch, it formed a distributary through Phoenix Ancestor Gregrace. "She" later hid the clues concerning the River of Eternal Darkness in "Her" Divine Kingdom, Calder√≥n City.[10] In the Fourth Epoch, traces of more Sefirot began to appear in the outside world. This is an important factor hidden behind many of the anomalies in this era.[8]

In the Fourth Epoch, Salinger managed to get a hold of the River of Eternal Darkness' distributary. "He" forcefully tried to use it to accommodate the  Red Priest Uniqueness to create a new path to become a Great Old One. "He" became Half a Great Old One, but also went mad.[11][8] Before "He" fell, "He" left "His" foreshadowing of resurrection in the River of Eternal Darkness.[12]

Sometime during the Fourth Epoch or Fifth Epoch, another distributary formed in Underground Trier in the form of the Samaritan Women's Spring. Its river water had been used by subsequent Beyonders of the Darkness, Death and Twilight Giant Pathways to conduct Ritualistic Magic and Advancement Rituals.[13][14] In 1358 of the Fifth Epoch, Hela and Audrey Hall obtained a bottle of distributary water respectively due to Lumian Lee's Tarot Club mission.[15] When following Harrison, Franca Roland obtained some water from the Spring later at Mr. Star's behest.[?] Another distributary was encountered in Tizamo Town's Dream Festival at a black tomb sealing Naboredisley.[16]

Some time before The Day of Many Disasters, the Evernight Goddess had established a connection with the source River of Eternal Darkness through working with Amandina, the Underworld Daoist disciple. "She" was able to manifest it to kill the Eternal Blazing Sun before "He" was taken over by the Primordial God Almighty.[17]

At some point before The Apocalypse, the Evernight Goddess had preemptively gained partial control of the River of Eternal Darkness, satisfying the condition necessary to accommodate the Sefirah. During The Apocalypse, the seal over the Western Continent was lifted. After the Evernight Goddess made an oath on the River of Eternal Darkness, the Underworld Daoist transferred the position of the Haoli Sect Master to "Her", allowing "Her" to fully accommodate the Sefirah and become the Eternal Darkness to fight against the Outer Deities.[9]

Power & Abilities
The River of Eternal Darkness is the symbol of death, repose, destination, endpoint, and darkness...etc.. Every time someone dies, they will leave an imprint in the River of Eternal Darkness. Once the number of deaths reaches a certain level, their true bodies might be attracted to the River of Eternal Darkness one day, ending up as one of the figures that wander around there for an eternity.[18] The distributaries show pale-white waters.[?]

For the Twilight Giant, Darkness and Death pathways, the river water of the River of Eternal Darkness serves diverse purposes determined by its utilization, rituals, and compatibility. It can be used for temporarily clearing memories, healing essential damage to the spirit, improving one's spiritual perception, becoming an ingredient for important rituals, and for unlocking various abilities, among other uses. It can also be used by Beyonders of any pathway to erase all memories and feelings, becoming an entirely new person.[13]

The River also has an oath binding-contract property "Oath of the River Styx" that even a Sequence 0 cannot undo, even after said Sequence 0 had accommodated the Sefirah and ascended to a Great Old One.[9]

9.content:
From a mystical point of view, this world is divided into three levels: the Physical World, the Spirit World, and the Astral World. The rest are formed by attaching to one of these three, like the Underworld to the Spirit World.[1] Unless entirely and specifically isolated, every place is connected to the Spirit World and the Astral World. This is one of the symbolic meanings of a Pillars.[2]

Compared to other Great Old Ones, the Pillars possess special symbolism. "They" are the foundation for the universe's maintenance and development, each supporting one of the three layer of the world. Each controls a realm, but not completely. "Their" authorities overlap with each other.

God Almighty, Lord of the Astral World
Lord of Mysteries, Dominator of the Spirit World
Mother Goddess of Depravity, Sovereign of the Physical World
Although Fate was mixed with Reality, the Spirit World, and the Astral World at the beginning of creation, the reason Fate has no Pillars is that its essence is complete chaos, making it impossible for a ruler to exist above it.

The three Pillars differ significantly in how "They" wield "Their" respective symbols and how "They" can utilize "Their" power:

God Almighty:
"They" can disrupt the Astral World by causing abstract concepts and symbolic markers there to descend into chaos. This can delay or disorient other Great Old Dominators and prevent "Them" from using the Astral World to travel elsewhere.
"They" can partially seal certain other Symbols through the Astral World to disrupt or affect them
Lord of Mysteries:
"They" can seal the Spirit World. For a set period, no creatures, including other Great Old Dominators, could enter the Spirit World without "Their" explicit permission. All their abilities, authorities, and symbols related to the Spirit World were rendered ineffective.
As the Spirit World's Dominator, "They" can see and know every piece of information within the Spirit World.
"They" can utilize the power within the Spirit World to make "Their" subordinates exceed their sequence, this power comes in the form of Boons, with the upper limit attainable being the level of a King of Angels.[7]
Mother Goddess of Depravity:
"She" could not seal off Reality to prevent unauthorized entry or expel all adversaries. Such actions were unachievable. "She" could only impose a continuous weakening effect on targets within Reality.
Reality is the foundation of the universe. Unless everything ended, Reality would eternally exist. Thus, the Mother Goddess of Depravity possessed the characteristic of Indestructibility, never to perish. As long as "She" wished, "She" could not be displaced or sealed.[9]
Power
Complete Pillars hold powers and statuses higher than other Great Old Ones, but are not fundamentally different.[3] By relying on the unique symbolism of a Pillar, "They" all can contend with two other Great Old Ones with symbolisms countering "Their" own.

Lord of Mysteries:
Against Great Old Ones with specific symbols capable of countering the "Their" abilities to manifest in countless forms and fight against multiple enemies at once, "They" could only rely on the unique symbolism of a Pillar to contend with two at most.
In the absence of counter abilities and symbolisms, there is no fundamental difference between battling two or eight Great Old Ones.[ There is no limit to the number of Great Old Ones "They" can fight.
God Almighty:
The symbolism of The Omnipotent and Omniscient makes it very hard for "Them" to be truly countered or suppressed. For symbolisms of other Great Old Ones that counter "Them" or "Their" allies, "They" can temporarily reduce the degree of countering.
"They" can establish global parameters, affecting the exertion efficiency of other Great Old Ones and weakening "Them".
When not being countered or suppressed, there's no limit to the number of Great Old Ones "They" can fight.
Mother Goddess of Depravity:
As a support, "She" is invincible. "She" can also hold off two or three Great Old Ones by "Herself".
However, even if 100 Great Old Ones besiege "Her", as long as there is no Fourth Pillar or something similar, "She" can only be severely injured at most, and will still be immortal and indestructible.
Convergence Instinct
The Pillar is the limit of stable existence and suppression of the convergence instinct. If a complete Pillar accommodates one more Sefirah, "They" will lose control over "Their" convergence instinct and will actively consume more Sefirot until "They" converge into the Original Creator, causing "His" revival. Once this process begins, it can only be interrupted by "Their" complete fall and division.[3]

Similarly, a non-Pillar Great Old Dominator cannot further accommodate a Sefirah with Pillar symbolism. However, occupying one or two neighboring Uniquenesses and the corresponding Sequence 1 Beyonder Characteristics from a Pillar is not a problem. "Their" power will increase slightly, and "Their" abilities will become more diverse. Besides, just because "They" can't accommodate a Pillar's Sefirah doesn't mean there's no suitable way for "Them" to use it.[16]

A non-Pillar Great Old Dominator can still accommodate another non-Pillar Sefirah that has similar, close, or adjacent symbolism to "Their" own. This would make "Them" equal in power to the Pillars, though "They" still wouldn't possess the symbolism of Pillars.

Lord of Mysteries

Authorities & Symbolisms
"They" possess full authority over the Fool, Error, and Door Pathways and corresponding symbols, which include but are not limited to the following:

 Fool: Authorities over Fooling, Reassembly, Miracles, Anchor of Destiny, and History with the symbols of Controller of The Spirit World, Fooling, and Bizarreness.
 Door: Authorities over Doors, Position, and Replication with the symbols of Door, Alternate Worlds, and Space.[3]
 Error: Authorities over Errors, Time, Theft, Space, and Deceit with the symbols of Errors, Time, and Destiny.
Note: A Pathway having certain symbolism doesn't mean at the level of Above the Sequence that it entirely stems from that Pathway. It might stem from the entire group or certain parts from it.

The authorities above are derived from the following symbolisms:

Dominator of the Spirit World: One of "Their" most important symbolisms is "Their" symbolism as a Pillar. "They" possess control over the Spirit World, one of the three layers of the world.
A Pillar is slightly stronger but has no fundamental difference compared to the other Great Old Ones. In general, by relying on the unique symbolism of a Pillar, "They" will have the status and power to contend with two other Great Old Ones at most.[4]
However, for the Lord of Mysteries who wields the King of Space-Time symbolism, as long as there is no Great Old Ones with specific symbolisms or abilities that counter "Their" specialty, there is no fundamental difference between battling two, eight, or countless Great Old Ones.[4][5]
Even though Sefirot and Uniquenesses can only be used by one Marionette or Avatar at a time, "They" can still fight multiple opponents by relying on the Door Pathway to control various battlefields and then use Marionettes and Avatars in different battlefields to interfere and affect with "Their" enemies.[6]
"They" would undoubtedly be able to hold off the Goddess of Fate, Supernova Dominator, Mother Tree of Desire (without Father of Devils symbolism), and Circle of Inevitability on "Their" own at the same time.
While "They" might not secure a decisive victory, "They" would certainly not lose or allow "Their" enemies disrupt other battlefields significantly.[7]
"They" can Seal the Spirit World, severing others' connections and influence over it, ensuring that for a set period, no creature can enter or utilize the Spirit World without "Their" permission.
"Their" Seal over the Spirit World could block other Great Old Dominators from entering, but could not prevent a Great Old Dominator inside from leaving or breaking the seal.[8]
The Goddess of Fate could leave the Spirit World through the River of Fate but could not use it to enter the Spirit World.
The Supernova Dominator would be able to break through the Spirit World's Seal with "His" attacks from the inside.
This renders all abilities, authorities, and symbols related to the Spirit World ineffective.[7]
"They" would be able to utilize the power within the Spirit World to make "Their" subordinates exceed their Sequence. This power comes in the form of Boons.[9]
The upper limit that "They" could grant is a King of Angels level, this is the same way Spirit World Creatures get their power, level, and state.
As its Dominator, "They" can see and know every piece of information within the Spirit World.[9]
The Lord of Mysteries would be able to instantly receive the different corresponding information to the situations "They" face from the Spirit World.[10]
This lets "Them" effectively shift "Their" focus accordingly to any change in the battlefield.
Decryption: "They" can Decrypt any lead to "Their" target then use "Their" authority over Positions to precisely locate them everywhere, even if those targets are Concealed.[11]
Replication: "They" can Replicate the powers of other Pathways; however, "They" cannot Replicate the symbolisms of True Deities or Great Old Ones.[12]
Klein Replicated the Distortion power from the Black Emperor Pathway, and used it to influence the contract drafted by the Primordial God Almighty.[13]
Among the three Pathways of the Lord of Mysteries, the  Fool Pathway wields the biggest portion of this symbolism.
Compared to the Door Pathway that merely uses the Spirit World for Traveling and the Error Pathway that uses the Spirit World for Decryption and influencing the Body of Heart and Mind, the Fool Pathway controls the majority of the Spirit World authorities, being almost akin to a lesser Lord of the Spirit World.[14]
Inconceivable (Bizarreness): This is an inherited symbol from the Original Creator, which can be used to briefly borrow some of the Original Creator's powers.
"They" symbolize the 'Inconceivable', the 'Incomprehensible', the 'Indescribable', the 'Unimaginable'. The transformations brought by "Them" are unknowable, unexplainable, undiscussable, unnamable‚Äîthe Mysteries in the Lord of Mysteries' title.[15][16][17][18]
The Inconceivable symbol of the Lord of Mysteries can be used to point to the Original Creator, which is similar to the Maker symbolism of the God Almighty, and the Chaos Primogenitor symbolism of the Mother Goddess of Depravity,[15]
Depending on the situation the Lord of Mysteries can utilize the Inconceivable to lower the degree of countering and suppress the other symbolisms similar to The Omnipotent and Omniscient of the God Almighty.[19]
"Their" Change and Bizarreness symbols are intrinsically connected: one is a transformation that can be understood, while the other is one that cannot be described or reasoned out.[14]
Since Bizarreness is also called The Inconceivable, it inherently contains the concept of the "Incomprehensible". That is, it naturally carries a certain degree of Secrecy.[14]
Miracles: This belongs to The Inconceivable symbolism. Miracles themselves are 'Unexplainable' and 'Incomprehensible'‚Äîthat is why they are called Miracles.[14]
When Wishing an impossible Miracle, a Half-Lord of Mysteries can combine Miracles with Loopholes and Fooling to exploit Loopholes and change definitions to grant Wishes that cannot be achieved in the normal situation due to how the desired Wish is impossible or difficult. This is done by lowering the difficulty of the Wish.[20]
The granted Wish will not exactly match the true desired Miracle, but it will be fulfilled in a way that is lesser than the original intent. In other words, it's to grant a similar, less difficult Wish that can achieve a comparable temporary effect within the current situation.
When Lumian Lee's destiny was sealed, and his madness was unavoidable, even a Miracle could not fully reverse it. As such, the only option was to exploit Loopholes and lower the difficulty of the Wish, granting Lumian occasional "moments of clarity, rationality, and humanity" during madness. As for how "occasional" was defined, that was left to Fooling and Error to decide.[21]
The exploited Loophole was that nothing dictated that inevitable madness precluded occasional moments of lucidity.
"They" can arbitrarily reset the number of Resurrections of "Themselves" and other Miracle Invoker[22], and when "They" die, "They" can Resurrect immediately.[23]
Other applications of Miracles being done are:
Klein Wished for the star dominion to be restored to its state at the end of the previous epoch. Accompanied by his words, the materials left behind by the Supernova Dominator converged rapidly with the scenes from the Fog of History to form a sun and planets.[13]
Grafting (Reassembly): This is one of the manifestations of the Bizarreness symbolism[23].
Klein Grafted the attacks of the Goddess of Fate and the Supernova Dominator aiming at him into aiming at each other, causing "Them" to strike one another in friendly fire.[24]
Klein Moretti Grafted the surging Desires within his true body onto his Marionettes to avoid the influences from Mother Tree of Desire.[25]
Klein Grafted the Thunder God Beyonder Characteristics and  Tyrant Uniqueness from the deceased Lord of Storms to Grisha Adam.[26]
Change: Control over Change is one of "Their" core symbols. Thus "They" are able to slow, accelerate, halt, or introduce Errors into transformations.[27]
Examples of the Change symbolism include:
Klein could have used Change to influence the Mother Goddess of Depravity's accommodation of the Brood Hive, but doing so would require full exertion of Sefirah Castle's power.[27]
When the Mother Goddess of Depravity was weakened after invoking the unique symbolism of the Chaos Primogenitor, Klein could use Change to delay "Her" collapse into an embryonic state, while still being able to maintain the Astral Barrier and contend with the other eight Great Old Dominators at the same time.[27]
Klein Changed the duration so that the Celestial Master, Celestial Thearch, Golden Buddha were able to exhibit power approaching that of the Great Old Ones for longer, but there was still a time limit.[13]
Klein used Change to delay the awakening of the Primordial God Almighty's consciousness within Grisha Adam, to allow "Him" to hold on a little longer.[28]
Klein caused the Supernovae erupting from Supernova Dominator to undergo an immediate Change‚Äîan Error in their state‚Äîand cause them to collapse violently toward a single point, threatening to create an unimaginably massive black hole.[23]
King of Space-Time: "Their" control over Space-Time falls under the Change symbolism.[7]
Time: Time is a product of Change. As such, "They" can manipulate Time throughout the entire universe. It is acceptable to call "Them" the Monarch of the River of Time, but "They" are not the absolute ruler‚Äîother Great Old Ones also hold partial symbolism.[29]
Klein Moretti's ascension to Lord of Mysteries stopped the Time of the entire universe and even affected the Outer Deities.[30]
"They" can slow down Time. Around a black hole which already slows down Time, this causes Time to become near frozen, making even other Great Old Dominators like the Supernova Dominator to move with an unbelievable slowness.[23]
"They" can also speed up Time by reversing the stagnation of Change, pushing it into acceleration.[23]
History: As the King of Space-Time, "They" hold the symbolism of History,[31] and can make the Fog of History manifest in the Physical World and affect it.[32] as well as being able to see and know every piece of information within the Historical Void.[9]
Historical Projection Summoning:
A Half-Lord of Mysteries can sustain Historical Projections for at least hundreds of years with "Their" status, level, and strength.[33]
Klein Moretti pulled the Astral Barrier back from History, placing it in front of the Outer Deities, but the Historical Projection of the Astral Barrier lacked the Oldest One's status.[34]
"They" can return the Historical to History, resulting in things that is considered History and manifested in the Physical World being forced to return to the Historical Void.[35]
Klein eroded the Tree of Shadow with the Fog of History, causing the mottled bark, settled desires, and ancient scenes to gradually present a phantasmal texture.
Although "They" can't alter History, "They" can achieve a similar effect by Concealing a segment of History, and then replacing or overwriting it with an imagined History. It's like overlaying false History onto reality.[36]
However, a collaboration of True Gods would suffice to detect that the History has been manipulated.
The Lord of Mysteries can use the symbolism of History to summon the History of Reality being shaken during The Apocalypse war, then employ the symbolism of Fooling to blur the lines between History and Reality, and then use the symbolism of Error to equate the shaking of Reality with the Sovereign of Reality suffering severe damage, thereby inflicting heavy losses on the Mother Goddess of Depravity.[37]
Exile: "They" are able to Exile "Their" targets into the Historical Void for a certain period of time.[38]
The King of Space-Time, who held the symbolism of History, might not be able to kill the Circle of Inevitability but could certainly inflict suffering worse than death.[28]
Space: As the King of Space-Time, "They" can manipulate Space in various ways, such as being able to transfer billions of humans, countless other species, and the scenes from the dream to a target planet at the edge of the universe.[39]
Space-Time Labyrinth: "They" can create a Space-Time Labyrinth inside the Spirit World that is able to trap Great Old Dominators.[40]
Great Old Dominators in the domain of the Fate can rely on pure luck to escape the labyrinth through the River of Fate, however it will require several dozen seconds.[40]
Space Collapse: "Their" Space Collapse has a greater destructive power than the Supernova Dominator's Supernovae, however "His" Supernovae still have wider destructive range.[41]
"They" can travel through Space-Time.
"They" can travel back to the past, however it's still impossible for "Them" to change History, "They" could only Fool History for a certain period.[42][38]
This isn't because the King of Space-Time lacks the ability to change the past, but rather because the universe inherently restrains against any attempt of doing so.[43]
King of Space-Time makes "Them" able to hinder existences like the High-Dimensional Overseer from freely traversing Dimensions.[7]
Puppetry: The Subsidiary Authority from which Marionettes and Avatars abilities stem from, it is a lower manifestation of the Dominator of the Spirit World, Change and Bizarreness symbols.[44]
Due to the elevation of powers such as Parasitism, Marionettes, Historical Projection, Replication, and Blink, "They" can manifest in countless forms, creating avatars with a unique and ubiquitous nature. "They" possess the ability to fight multiple foes simultaneously.[7][45]
In the absence of counter abilities and symbolisms, those abilities allows "Them" to fight uncountable number of Great Old Ones.[4][46]
While "They" have a limit to how many forms "They" can take at once through Parasitism, Marionettes, Historical Projections, Replication, and Blink, it's impossible for normal creatures to witness this limit, allowing "Them" to achieve a relative state of Omnipresence.[47][17]
Spirit Body Threads Manipulation: "They" can instantly turn countless creatures‚Äîexceeding hundreds of billions‚Äîinto Marionettes and manipulate them simultaneously.[48]
"They" can turn Uniquenesses into Marionettes or Parasitize them.[49]
The  Error Pathway occupies a significant portion of the Change symbolism.[50]
Embodiment of Sefirah Castle: "They" can control and manifest the Sefirah Castle, a bluish-black Door of Light constantly emanates a faint Grayish-White Fog.
"They" can envelope the boundless universe with "Their" Grayish-White Fog.[30]
As the Lord of Mysteries, Klein's Fog of History spread throughout the World of Ruins, enveloping the entire planet and all living beings, it even spread beyond the barrier, into the boundless universe as well.[30]
All things affected by the Grayish-White Fog will either be Fooled, Deceived or Teleported.[30]
Living beings within the fog either became dull-witted, filled with cunning, or inexplicably transported to the place they knew most intimately.
Numerous rules malfunctioned, and many symbols were Fooled.
As the Embodiment of Sefirah Castle, when the Lord of Mysteries uses "Their" full power, "They" have to manifest the Sefirah Castle.[51][52]
Klein manifested the Sefirah Castle to fight against the Supernova Dominator and the Goddess of Fate at the same time, allowing him to resolve the battle quickly.[23]
As the Embodiment of Sefirah Castle, the Lord of Mysteries' resurrection is, to some extent, limited to Sefirah Castle and the corresponding pathways, even if other Sefirot were accommodated.
However, "They" also wield the symbol of Inconceivable, as such, "They" can use it to bypass this restrain whenever "They" want, so "They" aren't really restrained by it.[53]
The Sefirah Castle provides a defensive barrier that even a True God can't break.[54]
The Door of Light can be used to Graft and isolate two location together in a Concealed manner.[23]
Beacon of Destiny: "They" are the Beacon of Destiny, the one who guides the River of Fate.
"They" can guide every tributary of the River of Fate to one direction, as though it alone represented the true path and the real future.[23]
Klein Moretti guided Goddess of Fate's Destiny to one direction, the future where "She" rushes toward the Door of Light.
Klein Moretti's ability as the Beacon of Destiny, guided by the Genie's hint, led the Circle of Inevitability to the battlefield with the Calamity of Destruction Lumian Lee, the Eternal Darkness Amanises, and the Monarch of Decay, which ultimately led "Him" to achieve Redemption of the entire universe when the Termination symbolism was about to be manifested.[55]
"They" can become the Shadows Wandering Across Fate, entering the River of Fate, from the past, present, and future, and even make its flow stagnate.[56][57]
Beacon of Destiny counters Cycle of the Circle of Inevitability.[7]
Beacon of Destiny and Foolishness counter the Goddess of Fate's symbolisms, which primarily centered on conscious manipulation on the domain of Fate.[7]
However, Beacon of Destiny can't suppress and dominate all other Fate-related symbolisms.[58]
Fooling: "They" could turn the true to false, and the false to true, with the distinction between true and false no longer clear. Abstract things could become substantial, and could also be defined as pure concepts.[35]
As a master of Fooling, "They" are undoubtedly a master in the domain of exploiting equivalent symbolisms in mysticism.[59]
"They" can reinforce existing mystical connections and corresponding symbolisms, linking them across countless star dominions.[10]
Fooling can blur the distinction between a summoned History and the present, therapy making that History affect the present again.[37]
In The Fool's Dream, the potion can be Fooled, the ritual can be Fooled, the mind can be Fooled, even the boundary between fantasy and reality can be Fooled.[60]
Since the Dream is restricted to Sequence 7, the mental effects of potions, and the minimum requirements for rituals, even at the Demigod level, will also be suppressed to Sequence 7 level. Upon leaving the Dream, those problems will instantly return to the original level. Similarly, potion digestion inside the Dream will also be Grafted into reality.
If one dies in the Dream, affected by Fooling, their body in the real world will also die, producing Beyonder Characteristics. This feedback to the dream city will then Graft the Beyonder characteristics onto the recipient, achieving the effect of turning fantasy into reality and reality into fantasy.
Klein Moretti spread the grayish-white fog to obscure the fissures in the Astral Barrier, rendering them invisible and untouchable, as if they no longer existed. As a result, the Astral Barrier stabilized.[48]
By using Wish and Fooling, "They" can turn the Calamity of Destruction's spatial three-heads-six-arms form into a temporal one, where the three heads and corresponding bodies will each occupy different time segments of the day, living their own lives but still under the main consciousness' control.[61]
Error (Bug): The Loopholes in rules, the manifestation of all Errors. Thus, "They" are the expert at exploiting Loopholes and grasping the problem.[62][63][64][65]
Klein relied on the shared authority between him and the Circle of Inevitability to devise a vague and inaccurate Honorific Name that could refer to both of them. He also designed a ritual that allowed Lumian to automatically extract power from Termiboros every time he carried out the ritual without Klein's explicit attention through a 'back door' that has already been opened.[62]
By using the authority of the  Error Pathway and with a suitable medium, "They" can elevate the mystical connection between two separate entities that were originally one into a connection akin to that between an avatar and its true body, or oneself and oneself‚Äîallowing the damage and consequences experienced by one to be transmitted to the other.[10]
After borrowing the authority of the  Error Pathway from Klein, Amon was able to "reconstruct" the mystical connections between:
The Genie and the Uncertain Mist, using the Black Emperor Roselle Gustav (with corruptions from both the Uncertain Mist and the Nation of Disorder) as a medium.[66]
The Tenebrous World and the Mother Tree of Desire, using the  Chained Uniqueness (which was deeply corrupted by the Mother Tree of Desire[34]) as a medium.[67][10]
Error can make the Reality shaking equivalent to the Sovereign of Reality taking severe damage.[37]
Errors counters Destined of the Circle of Inevitability.[7]
Errors fall outside the scope of "All Things", thus can't be manipulated by the God Almighty who wields the symbolism of Maker with the ability to Create and manipulate "All Things".[68]
Foolishness: One of the core symbolisms of the Lord of Mysteries.[13] "They" can reduce the intelligence of other rational beings and make them Foolish.
When fighting against the Lord of Mysteries, the symbolism of Foolishness will gradually deepen its influence over time, making it hard to notice that one has fallen under its influence.[23]
Under the influence of Foolishness, the Supernova Dominator unknowingly created a black hole‚Äîone that contracts Space and dilates Time‚Äîwhich helped the King of Space-Time further stagnate Time.
The Foolishness symbolism, when being maintained and deepened at full force instead of stopping right after casting, can immediately halt the Supernova Dominator's thoughts and actions, making "Him" blankly and dazedly surveying the surroundings. As long as further actions won't threaten "His" life or cause "His" fall, "He" won't instinctively resist under deep Foolishness.[8]
For beings that act on instinct such as the Primordial Hunger, using the symbolism of Foolishness will not cause a noteworthy change, so it is better to use the symbolism of Deceit against such beings.[69]
Deceit: "They" are the symbol of Deceit.[70]
"They" wield the ability to Deceive and Misdirect other beings into choosing non-optimal courses of actions that they wouldn't normally choose, usually by exploiting their desires or instincts.
Klein Deceived the Primordial Hunger's instinct for convergence and desired target, forcibly guiding "Him" to seek the Chaos Sea "He" could merely control rather than the City of Calamity "He" could accommodate.[69]
Klein Deceived the Goddess of Fate, who was under the Foolishness symbolism, causing "Her" to Foolishly enter the Spirit World to use it as a shortcut to the Key of Light, before trapping "Her" inside a Space-Time Labyrinth.[40]
As a Half-Lord of Mysteries, Klein was able to exploit the Mother Goddess of Depravity's instinctual desire for the Brood Hive to Deceive "Her" into taking the initiative to breach the Western Continent's barrier.[71]
Klein Deceived the Mother Goddess of Depravity to make "Her" overlook his weakened state, even though "She" was still fully aware of the Celestial Master and company's condition.[13]
"They" can Deceive and manipulate the laws of nature, the rules of the world, and the mystical connections surrounding all.[72]
Under the Distortion power from the Black Emperor Pathway and the Deceit symbolism, the contract drafted by the Primordial God Almighty, which was originally exceptionally tight and without exploitable Loopholes, was modified into producing one.[13]
Doors: "They" can create Layers Upon Layers of Doors around a target to restrict them. Every time a Door broke, another appears in its place, covering the target and blocking the path of escape with countless layers of overlapping Doors. This is capable of holding back even the Supernova Dominator.[56]
Seals: "They" can Seal things inside objects and create unique Seals that siphon the power from the Sealed being, maintaining the Seal and making the Sealed being weaker.
"Their" Seals can efficiently Seal Angels, True Gods, Sefirot, Great Old Ones, and the Spirit World.
The Celestial Worthy of Heaven and Earth for Blessings Sealed the Son of Chaos inside a lamp with a Miracle Invoker Beyonder Characteristic, creating the Magic Wishing Lamp.
The Celestial Worthy of Heaven and Earth for Blessings Sealed seven Sefirot and the Western Continent.
Klein Moretti Sealed Termiboros, an Archangel of the Eternal Aeon Pathway inside Lumian Lee, siphoned some of "His" power and gave it to Lumian Lee as a Boon.
Klein Moretti Sealed the Spirit World, cutting the connection and influence the Outer Deities have on it.[7]
A Great Old Dominator whose consciousness, spirit, Sefirah, Uniquenesses, and Beyonder Characteristics are all intact can't be completely Sealed, especially when "They" lean toward reality.[40]
Despite being Sealed inside an Abomination Beyonder Characteristic and then in the Spirit World, the Supernova Dominator would have been able to escape "His" Seal in 3 to 4 minutes.[40]
Theft: At this level, Theft could be temporarily applied on the Destiny and Symbolisms of Great Old Ones, except for the symbolisms of Origin/Source.[73]
The Lord of Mysteries and the Key of Light combined can perform a rank substitution, a Theft, for the identity and Fate of the Goddess of Fate[74] or Circle of Inevitability[75], to make someone ascend and take "Their" place.
Countering Symbolisms
Symbols of other Great Old Ones can counter some of "Their" symbols and powers, which include but are not limited to the following:

Mother Goddess of Depravity:
New Life, Death, Desolation mutually counteracts Marionettes.[48]
The Marionettes controlled by the Lord of Mysteries can Wither or become Pregnant as their flesh and blood concentrated into offspring that were not marionettes, or gain New Life and consciousness, ceasing to be mere puppets and starting to resist the Marionettist controlling them.
However, the Marionettes' offspring or those reborn can also be turned into Marionettes, entering a new cycle and causing a stalemate.
New Life counters Foolishness.[13]
Every part of the Mother Goddess of Depravity was in a state of constant New Life, including "Her" soul, consciousness, spirit, and intellect. This caused "Her" to recover "Her" intellect as soon as "She" becomes Foolish.
However, this doesn't mean that "She" cannot be affected by Foolishness and be Deceived if "She" were to face the Lord of Mysteries directly.[28]
Sovereign of the Physical World counters Grafting, Theft, Seal, Banishment, and Blink.
The Mother Goddess of Depravity can fix mystical connections, spirits, consciousness, etc. in place, thus preventing them from being Grafted and Theft.
"She" solidified the mystical connection between the Mother Tree of Desire and Tenebrous World, disrupting Klein's Marionettes' attempt to Graft the connection back to themselves.[10]
"She" fixed the Goddess of Fate's consciousness and spirit in place, disrupting Klein's Theft and saving "Her" from the fate of being Sealed into the Chained materials.[76]
"She" could intertwine "Herself" within the fabric of the real universe and become rooted deeply in reality. This made "Her" unable to be Banished or Sealed.[27]
"Her" interference could cause Klein's Blinking form to flicker and become unstable.[10]
God Almighty:
The Omniscient mutually counteracts Inconceivable.
While the God Almighty represents The Omniscient, thus symbolically All-Knowing, the Lord of Mysteries symbolizes the Incomprehensible.[68]
The Omniscient counteracts Deceit, but not entirely.
Deceiving God Almighty is a very difficult process, as The Omniscient is not easily Deceived.[77]
Contracts mutually counteracts Errors, Deceit, Bizarreness.[78][13]
Using the Replicated power of Distortion alongside Deceit, Klein Moretti was able to Distort a clause of the Contract between the Primordial God Almighty and the Mother Goddess of Depravity.[13]
High-Dimensional Overseer:
Dimensionality and Change, which included space-time, mutually counteracts each other in a one-on-one situation.[7]
As the Lord of Dimensions, "He" could counter abilities such as Parasitism, Marionettes, and Blink.
From higher or lower Dimensions, Spirit Body Threads were tangible and real-something that could be touched. Blink only allowed movement on a small scale, while those Parasitized were bound together into one entity. This rendered the unique, ubiquitous nature of the Lord of Mysteries' avatars ineffective. Combat against the High-Dimensional Overseer could only rely on the Lord of Mysteries' true body.
Monarch of Decay:
Decay and Certain Death counter Avatars, Blink.[7]
Death of an Avatar equals the death of the main body.
Decay of an Afterimage equals the decay of the main body.
Inextinguishable Ravings:
Source of All Ravings counters Avatars, Marionettes, and Blink.[7]
"He" can ignore the interference of Marionettes, Avatars, and Afterimages to directly project "His" voice into Sefirot and Uniquenesses transmitting "His" madness and implanting "His" intent.
Primordial Hunger:
Convergence and Devouring counter Avatars, Marionettes, and Blink.[7]
Convergence: "He" could forcibly pull the Lord of Mysteries's true body to "His" side.
Devouring: If "He" Devoured an Avatar or Marionette, "He" could absorb and erase the corresponding abilities, reducing or even temporarily nullifying their symbolic influence.
Father of Devils:
Source of Curses counters Avatars, Marionettes:
"They" are capable of Cursing Avatars and Marionettes to indirectly Curse the true body.
Supernova Dominator:
Density, Gravity, and Attraction can influence Space-Time and distort Dimensions.
However, for the Lord of Mysteries, who controlled Change and could turn falsehood into truth and vice versa, mere indirect interference was sufficient to stall "Him" without engaging directly.
Circle of Inevitability:
Past, Present, Future, Cycle, and Destined could theoretically impact Avatars, Marionettes, and Blink.
However, the Circle of Inevitability's symbols were effectively countered by the Lord of Mysteries' other symbols:
King of Space-Time counters Past, Present, Future.
Beacon of Destiny counters Cycle.
Error counters Destined.

God Almighty
God Almighty is the title of the Great Old One of the  Visionary,Sun,Tyrant,White Tower, and Hanged Man Pathways.
This Great Old One is one of the three Pillars.

Authorities & Symbolisms
"They" possess full authority over the Visionary, Sun, Tyrant, White Tower, and Hanged Man Pathways and the corresponding symbols, which include but are not limited to the following:[2]
 Hanged Man: Authorities over Darkness, Corruption, Shadows, Mutation, and Degeneration with the symbols of Sin, Sacrifice, Maker and The Ruler of The Shadow World.[3][4]
 Visionary: Authorities over Mind, Discernment, Dream, Loss of Control, and Envisioning with the symbols of Creator and The Ruler of The Mind World.[3]
 Sun: Authorities over Holiness, Light, Order, and Sun with the symbols of Energy and Inextinguishable Light.
 Tyrant: Authorities over Matter, Tyrant, Water, Calamities, Wind, and Thunder with the symbols of Maker.
 White Tower: Authorities over Knowledge, Wisdom, and Omniscience.
The God Almighty's Symbolisms are both reality and abstraction-oriented.[5]
Note: A Pathway having certain symbolism doesn't mean at the level of Above the Sequence that it entirely stems from that Pathway. It might stem from the entire group or certain parts from it.

The authorities above are derived from the following symbolisms:

Lord of The Astral World: One of God Almighty's most important symbolisms is "Their" symbolism as a Pillar. "They" possess control over the Astral World, one of the three layers of the world.
A Pillar is slightly stronger but has no fundamental difference compared to the other Great Old Ones. In general, by relying on the unique symbolism of a Pillar, "They" will have the status and power to contend with two other Great Old Ones at most.[6]
However, for the God Almighty who wields the The Omnipotent and Omniscient symbolism, it's very hard for "Them" to be truly countered or suppressed, and "They" can suppress and counter other Great Old Ones by interfering with "Their" symbolisms.[7]
A Quasi-God Almighty can disrupt the Astral World by causing abstract concepts and symbolic markers there to descend into Chaos. This can delay and/or disorient other Great Old Ones and prevent "Them" from utilizing the Astral World to travel.[8]
"They" can partially Seal certain symbols via the Astral World to disrupt or affect them.[9]
A Quasi-God Almighty can light up the entire Astral World. When the Astral World is lit up, there will be no secrets that could be Concealed, and it can even reveal the invisible Astral Barrier that was formed by the Original Creator.[10]
The light in the Astral World can also help others regain "Their" senses from the effect of the Fool's Blind Stupidity.[11]
Among the five Pathways of the God Almighty, the  Visionary is the cornerstone of this symbolism.[12]
Chaos Sea: The God Almighty controls the Chaos Sea, a chaotic and strange sea that seemed to encompass all colors and all possibilities.
"They" can use the Chaos Sea to swallow an enemy to make them suffer immense damage or use it to submerge and protect an area, it can also be used to swallow attacks.
Adam used the Chaos Sea to engulf the Protected Zones to protect them from the terrifying gravitational pull of the immense star cluster caused by Supernova Dominator's influence.[13]
Amon used the First Blasphemy Slate to send the Chaos Sea to devour the blood-colored robe sent by the Mother Goddess of Depravity through Bethel Abraham.
Adam used the Chaos Sea to swallow the Black Emperor Roselle Gustav and the Genie.[14][15]
The Chaos Sea embraces all contradictions and conflicts, which is the reason behind the compatibility of the  Hanged Man and  Sun Pathways.[16]
"They" can create a domain of blazing, pure, Holy Sunlight that extends everywhere, leaving no Shadows behind, but at the same time, containing both Holiness and Degeneration and only a certain Degenerated Shadow to exist, and move within this domain. This Degenerated Shadow will attack the target causing them to Degenerate while being Purified.[17]
Prophecy: The future "They" proclaim will unfold and become reality.
As a Half-God Almighty, Adam manifested words written in the most ancient language on the surface of the Chaos Sea to make two Prophecies that affected Klein's Apotheosis Ritual: one to stop the Celestial Worthy's resurrection,[18] and one to prevent Klein from becoming The Fool through Antigonus' identity.[19]
The Omnipotent and Omniscient: "They" are Omnipotent and Omniscient; however, "Their" Omnipotence and Omniscience are only relative, not absolute in the true sense of the words.[20]
Each of the Pathways for the God Almighty represent an aspect of this symbolism.
If the  Visionary has sufficient understanding and mastery of relevant concepts, "They" can be in a sense Omnipotent. As Lord of The Mind World, "They" can also be Omniscient in a sense. However, that Omniscience is only when it's related to the Mind World.[21]
The  Hanged Man can Graze other Pathways, and thus represents Omnipotence which results in being Omniscient, making it interchangeable with the  White Tower.
The  White Tower represents Omniscience. Being Omniscient results in also being Omnipotent, making it interchangeable with the Hanged Man.[2]
The  Sun is the symbol and cornerstone of Energy for The Omniscient and Omnipotent.[16]
Due to the symbolism of the Inextinguishable Light, The Omnipotent and Omniscient can more easily return via the  Sun after "They" perish.[16]
The  Tyrant is Omnipotent within the Water, Land, and Air Domains.[2]
The Water domain even encompasses the Sea of Collective Subconscious, Chaos Sea, Spiritual Sea, River of Eternal Darkness, and River of Fate, which is why "They" are part of the Omnipotent and Omniscient; however, not all of them can be interfered with directly, some can only be done indirectly, and the degree of influence isn't very high.[22]
"They" can interfere with the symbols and authorities of others.[23]
When not being countered or suppressed, there's no limit to the number of Great Old Ones "They" can fight at the same time.[7]
The Omniscient and Omnipotent symbolism makes it very hard for "Them" to be truly countered or suppressed.[7]
For symbolisms of other Great Old Ones that counter "Them" or "Their" allies, "They" can temporarily reduce the degree of countering.[24]
"They" can establish global parameters, affecting the exertion efficiency of other Great Old Ones and weakening "Them".[16]
Genesis: "They" and the Mother Goddess of Depravity both hold a portion of the Genesis symbolism - opposing the Termination symbolism of the Fourth Pillar[25] - with "Them" holding a bigger portion.[26]
Maker: The Maker (ÈÄ†Áâ©‰∏ª: Z√†ow√πzh«î) is the same title as the Original Creator (ÊúÄÂàùÈÄ†Áâ©‰∏ª: Zu√¨ch≈´ z√†ow√πzh«î)[27] and can be used to point towards the Original Creator.[28]
Symbolically, the Maker is the ability to create and manipulate all things and powers.[29]
In terms of symbolism and concept, some symbolisms fall outside the scope of "all things", such as the Error symbolism of the Lord of Mysteries.[29]
Through the  Hanged Man's Mutation authority, "They" can Make and Shape living beings.[28]
Creator: Through the  Visionary's authority over Envisioning, "They" can Create objects, beings, and concepts through "Their" Imagination.[28]
"They" can temporarily Create Uniquenesses and Beyonder Characteristics of "Their" Pathways that border between reality and illusion to replace "Their" split off Uniquenesses and Beyonder Characteristics, allowing "Them" to still maintain "Their" state.[30] This can be done so long as it doesn't exceed the necessary limitations.[23]
Based on this property, there exists a way to ascend to a Half-God Almighty temporarily:
When the  Visionary first gains control over the Chaos Sea and has accommodated a second Uniqueness and corresponding Sequence 1 Beyonder Characteristic, to a certain extent, "They" could Envision the remaining, fake symbolism and authority, allowing "Them" to briefly obtain strength that transcended the Sequences, giving "Them" Half a Great Old One's strength.[31]
With the Chaos Sea as a source, Adam used "Himself" and the True Creator as a pillar to Envision and accommodate the three Uniquenesses of the  Sun,  Tyrant, and  White Tower Pathways.
This gave "Him" enough strength to not only forcefully suppress and trap the Eternal Blazing Sun, the Lord of Storms, and the God of Knowledge and Wisdom within "Their" respective Divine Kingdoms, but also make two Prophecies that interfered with Klein's Apotheosis Ritual.[31][18][19]
"They" can Create Beyonder Characteristics from any Pathway but are only able to Create Uniquenesses from the Pathways of the God Almighty group and is subjected to a time limit when doing so.[23][32]
Fatherhood: The God Almighty has the symbolism of Fatherhood,[33] and holds the corresponding titles in mysticism like Father of All Living Beings and The Great Father[34]
In the mid-First Epoch, foreseeing parts of the future, the Primordial God Almighty united with the Brood Hive to give birth to the twins Omebella and Zedus, making certain arrangements.[34][35]
The Eternal Blazing Sun used this symbolism when proselytizing to point to the Primordial God Almighty, even though it's beyond "Him" in mysticism. This allows "Him" to partially harness the power of the Chaos Sea.
However, it also strengthened the mystical connection between "Him" and the Primordial God Almighty, allowing the Primordial God Almighty to awaken on "His" body when this symbolism is strengthened through Omebella's birth in The Day of Many Disasters.[36][34]
Barrier: A Half-God Almighty can create a multi-layered prism-like spots of light that act as a Barrier, which can effectively resist the  Sun's,  Tyrant's, and  White Tower's attacks.[31]
Within the Barrier, there is a faint swirling light that repeatedly takes form, changing the critical points of the structure.
This can actively resist a  White Tower's investigative and calculative abilities, preventing "Them" from finding weaknesses in the Barrier.
The Barrier can rapidly produce new layers to replace destroyed ones; those layers can withstand a  Sun's attacks.
This is regardless of how much Energy is being released or how many flares of super high-temperature flames are being created.
It can ripple like an illusory ocean that seems to contain all colors, solidifying the surrounding environment.
This will cause the light spots carrying the Storm to slow down uncontrollably, which allows it to resist a  Tyrant's violent "wave" that can destroy a planet.
Contracts: The God Almighty can create a Contract comprised of the various concepts, symbolisms, and authorities in the Astral World that even a Pillar has to follow.
The Primordial God Almighty made a Contract with the Mother Goddess of Depravity to have "Her" help "Him" Resurrect that was exceptionally tight, leaving no exploitable Loopholes.[37]
Countering Symbolisms
Symbols of other Great Old Ones can counter some of "Their" symbols and powers, which include but are not limited to the following:

Lord of Mysteries:
Errors, Deceit, Bizarreness mutually counteracts Contracts.
Using the Replicated power of Distortion with Deceit, Klein Distorted a clause of the Contract between the Primordial God Almighty and the Mother Goddess of Depravity.[38]
Errors counter The Maker.
The Maker represents the ability to create and manipulate all things and powers. Error, being a Bug, happens to not fall within or conform to the scope of all things in terms of concept and symbolism.[29]
Inconceivable mutually counteracts The Omniscient.[39]
While the God Almighty represents The Omniscient, thus symbolically All-Knowing, the Lord of Mysteries symbolizes the Incomprehensible.[29]
Goddess of Fate:
The Weaver of All Fates partially counters the Mind and Envisioning.
The Goddess of Fate is stronger than the God Almighty in the domain of arrangements.
Eternal Darkness:
Concealment mutually counteracts Omniscience.
The Anarchy:
Distortion mutually counteracts Contracts: Distortion could Distort Contracts to a certain degree, but not fully change it.[38]
Using the Replicated power of Distortion with Deceit, Klein Distorted a clause of the Contract between the Primordial God Almighty and the Mother Goddess of Depravity.

Mother Goddess of Depravity

The Mother Goddess of Depravity is one of the Outer Deities from the Cosmos that attempted to invade Earth. "She" is also known as the Primordial Moon, The Great Mother, the Sovereign of the Physical World and the Mother of All Things. "She" has been occupying the Moon since the First Epoch, terraforming it to the Crimson Moon.

"She" is the first child of the Original Creator, and is one of "His" three direct children along with the Mother Tree of Desire and the Son of Chaos. "She" is also the ruler of all feminine power of the Cosmos.

"She" was the original owner of the  Mother and  Moon Pathways. "She" is also the current owner of the  Chaos Primogenitor Pathway.

"She" is the Sovereign of the Physical World, one of the three Pillars that are the foundation for the universe's maintenance and development.[4] When the Original Creator split into pieces, "He" created a force strong enough to tear the Sefirot apart. Part of "Her" Sefirah was torn from "Her" and became the Brood Hive, which was attracted to Earth along with the Moon and Mother characteristics "She" held. Then the Mother Goddess of Depravity became not much different from the other Outer Deities, but still with the symbol of Pillar on "Her".

Besides the Mother Goddess of Depravity, the Mother Tree of Desire, and the Son of Chaos who were directly born from the Original Creator, the remaining Outer Deities were all born from the union of the Mother Goddess of Depravity and the Original Creator. "They" are the first batch of beings created by "Her", thus "She" is the true Mother of All Things.

"She" is said to have a conflict with the Mother Tree of Desire, but "They" have also cooperated.

Authorities & Symbolisms
"She" possesses full authority over the Chaos Primogenitor Pathway and partial authorities over the Mother Pathway and Moon Pathway (through accommodating the Brood Hive but without the Uniquenesses), and the corresponding symbols, which include but are not limited to the following:

 Mother: Authorities over Life, Desolation, and Birth and Symbol of Motherhood.‚ÅÇ
 Moon: Authorities over Beauty, Life (Creation), and Spirituality and Symbol of Moon(Crimson Moon, Blood Moon, Full Moon, Silver Moon and Waning Moon).
 Chaos Primogenitor: Authorities over Reproduction, Propagation, Reality, and the Symbol of Nurturing the nascent Original Creator of the next Universe.[10]
This Pathway is a mix of two different Pathways:[11][12][13][14][15]
The Pathway of Original Sin, Evil and Corruption, which includes the Exploitation of Life. The Sequence 0 name is Chaos Primogenitor.
The Pathway of Reality and Procreation. The Sequence 0 name is World.
To match the Mother Goddess of Depravity's Honorific Names to "Her" Pathways and Authorities:[16][14]

"Origin of Evil" - Chaos Primogenitor Pathway
"The Indestructible" - Physical World (Reality) Authority
"Sovereign of the Physical World" - World Pathway
Derived from the above, "She" also possesses the following abilities/symbols:

Sovereign of the Physical World: One of the most important symbolisms for the Mother Goddess of Depravity is "Her" symbolism as a Pillar. "She" possesses control over the Physical World, one of the three layers of the world.
A Pillar is slightly stronger but has no fundamental difference compared to the other Great Old Ones. In general, by relying on the unique symbolism of a Pillar, "She" has the status and power to contend with two or three other Great Old Ones at most.[17][18]
However, the Mother Goddess of Depravity is invincible as a support, and as the wielder of the The Indestructible symbolism, except for scenarios where "She" faces the Fourth Pillar, the Original Creator, or overextends the Chaos Primogenitor symbolism, "She" will never perish even when facing hundreds of Great Old Ones at once.[18]
The Indestructible: Reality is the foundation of the universe. Unless everything ended, reality would eternally exist. Thus, the Soul and the body of Mother Goddess of Depravity possessed the characteristic of Indestructibility, never to perish[19] except three scenarios:[20]
Encountering the Original Creator, who could make the impossible happen.
The emergence of the Fourth Pillar symbolizing the end of everything.
Overextending the Chaos Primogenitor's unique symbolism.
As long as "She" wishes, "She" cannot be Banished or Sealed.[19]
"She" can transform into a colossal, ethereal oak tree, rooted deeply in reality, supporting the heavens, and intertwining "Herself" with the fabric of the real universe, to prevent "Herself" from being Banished or Sealed.[20]
"She" can "fix" mystical connections, spirits, and consciousness, among other things, in place, disrupting interference and influences from other entities. This is symbolized as an illusory, slightly damaged oak tree.
The Mother Goddess of Depravity solidified the mystical connection between the Mother Tree of Desire and Tenebrous World, disrupting Klein's Marionettes' attempt to Graft the connection back to themselves.[21]
The Mother Goddess of Depravity "fixed" the Goddess of Fate's consciousness and spirit in place, disrupting Lord of Mysteries Klein's Theft and saving "Her" from the fate of being Sealed into the Chained materials.[22]
Unlike the Lord of Mysteries, "She" can't Seal off reality to prevent unauthorized entry or expel all adversaries, however, "She" can impose a continuous weakening effect on targets within reality.[19]
As the Sovereign of the Physical World, "She" possess the authority of "Foundation", making all Outer Deities rely on "Her" for "Their" existence, which is why "She" cannot be Destroyed or Sealed.[23]
Genesis: "She" and the God Almighty both hold a portion of the Genesis symbolism - opposing the symbolism of Termination of the Fourth Pillar[24] - with the God Almighty holding a bigger portion.[25]
Motherhood/Maternal Instinct:
Excluding Mother Tree of Desire and Son of Chaos, "Her" union with the Original Creator gave birth to all other Outer Deities. "They" are the first batch of beings created by "Her", thus "She" is the true Mother of All Things and The Great Mother.[4]
This symbolism later became part of the Goddess of Origin, the Great Old One title corresponding to the Brood Hive that was separated from "Her" and attracted to Earth.[7]
"She" later reaccommodated the Brood Hive during The Apocalypse, but did not retrieve the  Mother Uniqueness and  Moon Uniqueness.
In the First Epoch, the Primordial God Almighty and the Brood Hive gave birth to Omebella and Zedus, making certain arrangements. In The Day of Many Disasters, the birth of Omebella strengthened the symbolism of the Mother in mysticism, allowing the Mother Goddess of Depravity to bypass the Astral Barrier to descend on Earth.[26]
Chaos Primogenitor: "She" is the Nurturer of the Chaos Primogenitor - the Original Sin and the nascent Original Creator of the next universe, it symbolizes the new beginning of the universe and thus cannot be completely destroyed. This is one of "Her" two most vital symbols, and a key reason "She" remains a Pillar even after the Brood Hive's separation.[10][27][28]
Origin of Evil: The Pathway of the Chaos Primogenitor is the Pathway of Evil and Corruption, which includes the Exploitation of Life.[14] As such, "She" possesses the corresponding Honorific Name and symbolism of the Origin of Evil.
"She" can invoke the special symbolism of the Chaos Primogenitor once every Major Month (2,160 years).
The normal heartbeats of the Chaos Primogenitor helped "Her" accelerate the accommodation of the rebelling Brood Hive, despite being disrupted by the countless Marionettes and Avatars from the Lord of Mysteries.[10][29]
The extremely special heartbeat of the Chaos Primogenitor about to be born and "Its" imminent entry into reality shattered the Astral Barrier that originated from the Original Creator, as if its original master had recalled it.[27]
The Chaos Primogenitor is no exception from the Fourth Pillar's Termination Symbolism, but with the destruction of the universe and the beginning of a new cosmic cycle, it means a new Chaos Primogenitor is born and grows.[30]
Invoking this special symbolism would put "Her" in a state of prolonged weakness for centuries[27] that cannot be recovered using New Life.[20]
If "She" borrowed this special symbolism for less than 2,160 years, the Chaos Primogenitor would truly descend into the real world - a devastating catastrophe to "Her",[27] and could cause "Her" to perish despite the symbolism of The Indestructible.[20]
New Life: "She" can give New Life to "Herself", Souls, consciousness, spirits, intellect, and Beyonder powers.
Using New Life on "Herself":
Rebirth: "She" can initiate New Life to reset "Her" form, reverting "Herself" to an embryonic state for Rebirth. This process would reset all symbols associated with "Her", except those intrinsic to "Her" being, erasing external mystical correspondences.[20]
If "She" used Rebirth during the process of accommodating the Brood Hive, this would reset "Her" progress to zero.
Every part of the Mother Goddess of Depravity was in a state of constant New Life, including "Her" soul, consciousness, spirit, and intellect. This caused "Her" to recover "Her" intellect as soon as "She" became Foolish, rendering "Her" immune to the core symbolism of the Lord of Mysteries.[31]
Using New Life on others' consciousnesses:
The natural influence of "Her" symbolism let all the consciousnesses within Calamity of Destruction Lumian to gain New Life, including that of Cheek, Tudor, the Primordial God Almighty, the divided Mirrored Original Creator, and the Malevolent Dragon.[17]
Grisha Adam was bathed in crimson moonlight, bringing New Life to all consciousnesses within "Him", including that of Herabergen, Leodero, and the Primordial God Almighty.[21][32]
Using New Life on others' Beyonder powers:
The interferences from the Eternal Blazing Sun, Evernight Goddess, Earth Mother, God of Steam and Machinery, and God of Knowledge and Wisdom in Bethel Abraham's apotheosis ritual were all given New Life, no longer able to be controlled by their original owners.[33]
A portion of the billions of Marionettes under the Lord of Mysteries Klein's control gained New Life and consciousness, ceasing to be mere puppets and starting to resist his control. Many Marionettes attempted to use various abilities, but the majority of these powers betrayed their original owners, instead destroying them.[34]
Each strand of the Lord of Storms' lightning form was tainted scarlet, gaining New Life as they detached and scattered, killing "Him".[35]
"Her" corruption will still remain even after a Black Emperor dies and revives through the Astral World, accompanying "Their" resurrection with a New Life of corruption.[36]
"Her" symbolic nature would continue to influence the surrounding area even when "She" hesitates to attack due to other entities' influences, such as Charm from the Calamity of Destruction.[17]
The symbolism of New Life has immensely powerful healing properties, "She" can quickly heal "Herself" and other Great Old Ones' wounds.[20][31][21]
Only certain symbols and concepts would weaken the effectiveness of New Life, such as the symbol of Destruction[21] and the power of Termination.[24]
New Life cannot heal "Her" from the prolonged state of weakness caused by invoking the symbolism of the Chaos Primogenitor.[20]
The emergence of the Eternal Darkness allows the previously wandering Souls on Earth in the Spirit World to finally have Eternal Rest in the River of Eternal Darkness, but without the Mother Goddess of Depravity's symbolism, the reincarnation cycle will not occur on Earth.[1]
Beauty and Spirituality: "She" is the symbol of beauty in the universe, radiating an unmistakable maternal brilliance. Even "Her" enemies would hesitate to strike at "Her". This makes "Her" a less likely target of malice.[17]
Moon: "She" is able to make a Blood Moon to suddenly descend into the Astral World, illuminating all the distorted concepts there, as well as preventing any Deity from escaping.[37]
Endpoint: "She" is the final Destination of all things, the common Endpoint of all Life.[38]
This authority overlaps with the authority of the Death and Darkness.
Spirit Body & Spirituality: "She" is the destination of Spirits and their Master.[39]
This authority overlaps with the authority of the Death and Darkness.
Death and Desolation: "She" can influence other entities to wither, collapsing into death and returning to the embrace of Mother Earth.
Many of Lord of Mysteries Klein's Marionettes withered under "Her" moonlight[34] and "Her" Banshee-like scream.[20]
Under "Her" Banshee-like scream, the collapse of Calamity of Destruction Lumian's consciousness and body accelerated further from the influence of Death and Desolation.[20]
Corruption: As an Above the Sequence, those without sufficient rank who discover "Her" existence will be Corrupted‚Äîmanifestations of this Corruption include sprouting genitalia, staining blood-red, or swelling as fetuses prepare to tear their way out of their body.[40]
Countering Symbolisms
Symbols of other Great Old Ones can counter some of "Her" symbols and powers, which include but are not limited to the following:

Calamity of Destruction:
Destruction counteracts New Life
Wounds and compound weaknesses dealt to "Her" would take longer to heal under the influence of the symbolism of Destruction
Masculinity mutually counteracts with Femininity. 
Lord of Mysteries:
History, Fooling, and Error can inflict severe damage to the Sovereign of the Physical World.
The Lord of Mysteries could use the symbolism of History to summon the History of Reality being shaken during The Apocalypse war, then employ the symbolism of Fooling to blur the lines between History and Reality, and then uses the symbolism of Error to equate the shaking of Reality with the Sovereign of the Physical World suffering severe damage, thereby inflicting heavy losses on the Mother Goddess of Depravity. However, this isn't enough to kill or Seal "Her".

10.content:
The City of Calamity (ÁÅæÁ•∏‰πãÂüé, ZƒÅihu√≤ Zhƒ´ Ch√©ng) is one of the nine Sefirot on Earth. It corresponds to the Above the Sequence Calamity of Destruction.

It is one of two Sefirot making up the Fourth Pillar.

The vast metropolis composed of two intersecting timelines. It appears as an infinitely large or infinitely small version of Pre-Epoch Shanghai from the Cultural Revolution. Its wide streets are filled with trackless trams, yellow rickshaws dragging bloated women, and occasional black automobiles, surrounded by multi-story buildings in various architectural styles. Populated by cultivators from different sects of the Western Continent. It was accompanied by an image of corrupted citizens. Some of the figures were distorted into a single head dragging a bloody spine; others were well-dressed but headless; and others were swollen, with their features obscured.[2][3][4]

Dragon Lock Tower
Gathered the world's might, halved the ranks of the brave, binding the malevolent dragon here, quelling the calamity it gave.

Erected by the Fifth Celestial Master
On Circle of Inevitability, Chapter 1079
An oddly shaped wooden temple surrounded by a yellow wall. Its double doors are guarded by multiple cultivators to keep strangers away from the shrine's entrance. The first floor is spacious, with towering columns and a stone staircase, illuminated by sunlight filtering through its thin paper windows. Beneath this on its lowest floor lies an ancient well, where the malevolent dragon is sealed.[3][5]

Black iron chains extend from stone blocks to the depth of that well, engraved with demonic entities. Some of them were cultivators who voluntarily transformed themselves to bind the dragon. They willingly accepted eternal torment, choosing to descend into demonic hell to ensure the dragon remained imprisoned. Empowered by the River of Eternal Darkness and controlled by the Haoli Sect's master, these demons could partially resist the dragon's powers.[5][4]

The bottom of the well has blood-like liquid - entrance to the sea of blood stanched with rust and filled with corpses. The mirror world corresponds to the place where the dragon was sealed. Dragon's shadow appears at the bottom of this sea, occupying an area comparable to the size of Trier. Before this shadow was a square several tens of kilometers wide and long, paved with greyish-white stones, with towering pillars of black, blood-red, and grey-white supporting an invisible barrier, preventing the blood-red sea from invading. At this square stands a full-length mirror connected to Blue Avenger's treasure vault.[5]

History
After the Original Creator awakened at the end of the Pre-Epoch, "His" two dominant split entities - the Primordial God Almighty and the Celestial Worthy of Heaven and Earth for Blessings - leveraged "Their" long-prepared ancient schemes across the times of the Old Earth to gradually gain advantages in "Their" fight against the other Sefirot. The two Pillars eventually defeated the other Sefirot and shattered "Their" wills (excluding the Brood Hive and the Key of Light),[6] making those wills take a very long time to recover and awaken again.[7]

During the early-mid stages of the First Epoch, the first Sefirah accommodated by the Primordial God Almighty was the City of Calamity. Beyond "His" deep desire for it, "He" likely foresaw its dangers. By intervening personally and using the chaotic head as a barrier, "He" prevented yin and yang from fully merging, halting their integration, and averting the birth of the Mirrored Original Creator.[4] This left "His" consciousness and psyche in the Sefirah after "His" death.[8][9] Since "He" also accommodated the Tenebrous World, the two Sefirot have mutually corrupted each other.[10]

After the Primordial God Almighty and the Celestial Worthy of Heaven and Earth for Blessings's death at the hands of each other, the City of Calamity was sealed in the Western Continent by the Celestial Worthy along with 6 other Sefirot.[11] After the fusion and influence of generations of Dao Integrators in the Western Continent, the consciousness of the City of Calamity came alive as the Malevolent Dragon.[12] At some point, "It" was sealed in the Dragon Lock Tower, through the effort of sect leaders in the Western Continent utilizing the powers of the other Sefirot, as well as the sacrifice of many Daoist cultivators throughout the generations.

As time went by, the seal of the Western Continent gradually weakened. The Sefirot would instinctively or consciously corrode the Uniqueness and High-Sequence Beyonder Characteristics within their symbolic range to influence the outside world. In the Fourth Epoch, traces of more Sefirot began to appear in the outside world. This is an important factor hidden behind many of the anomalies in this era.[11]

At the end of July 1360 in the Fifth Epoch, Lumian Lee arrived in the City of Calamity, defeated the Malevolent Dragon, accommodated the City of Calamity and became the Calamity of Destruction.[13]

Powers & Abilities
At Sequence 2
Upon becoming a Sequence 2: Weather Warlock, if a Red Priest Beyonder has a connection to the City of Calamity, "They" can draw power from the City of Calamity to turn "Their" flames from a violet-tinged azure color to a violet tinged with a blood-red hue color.[14]
